about_the_game:
Game Factory was more than just a tool; it was a gateway to democratizing game development. It made the process fun, accessible, and engaging for everyone, inviting you to dive into the world of game creation and unleash your creativity. Whether you're a novice or a seasoned pro, this tool offered a delightful way to bring your game ideas to life. So, gear up and start building your gaming dreams today!

Key Features and Benefits

  • Drag-and-Drop Interface: Users could design game environments and characters effortlessly using a simple drag-and-drop interface.

  • Visual Scripting: The tool provided no-code visual scripting to create game logic, making it accessible for beginners.

  • Multiplayer Support: Users could collaborate in real-time with friends to build games together.

  • Asset Library: It included a library of pre-made assets and allowed users to import their own 3D models.

  • Multiple Device Support: Allowing you to create and play your games on various platforms. Whether you're on a PC or Mobile, your game-building experience remains seamless.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Catalina
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Game Factory makes 3D game creation accessible for everyone with features like drag-and-drop interface, no-code visual scripting, real-time multiplayer & collaboration, a rich asset library, and support for importing 3D models. It works across multiple devices, making game development fun and easy.
